facelet-taglib.description: The Liferay Faces Alloy facelet component tags with the aui: tag name prefix.

function.description: Returns an escaped representation of the specified client ID.
Returns the client ID associated with the specified expression.

tag.description: A base class for ACE Editor. Check the [live demo](http://alloyui.com/examples/ace-editor/).

attribute.description: The outermost DOM node for the Widget, used for sizing and positioning of a Widget as well as a containing element for any decorator elements used for skinning.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterBoundingBoxChange

attribute.description: A DOM node that is a direct descendant of a Widget's bounding box that houses its content.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterContentBoxChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the destroy lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDestroyedChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget should be disabled. The disabled implementation is left to the specific classes extending widget.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDisabledChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget, or one of its descendants, has focus.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterFocusedChange

attribute.description: The height of ACE Editor.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterHeightChange

attribute.description: Determine if the active line of code will be highlighted or not.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterHighlightActiveLineChange

attribute.description: <!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterIdChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the init lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterInitializedChange

attribute.description: The default locale for the widget. NOTE: Using get/set on the "strings" attribute will return/set strings for this locale.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterLocaleChange

attribute.description: Correspond to the language being typed.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterModeChange

attribute.description: Determine if the code will be editable or not.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterReadOnlyChange

attribute.description: Whether or not to render the widget automatically after init, and optionally, to which parent node.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterRenderChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this Widget has been through the render lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterRenderedChange

attribute.description: Determine if print margin will be visible or not.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterShowPrintMarginChange

attribute.description: The DOM node to parse for configuration values, passed to the Widget's HTML_PARSER definition<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterSrcNodeChange

attribute.description: Collection of strings used to label elements of the Widget's UI.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterStringsChange

attribute.description: Number (between -32767 to 32767) indicating the widget's position in the default tab flow. The value is used to set the "tabIndex" attribute on the widget's bounding box. Negative values allow the widget to receive DOM focus programmatically (by calling the focus method), while being removed from the default tab flow. A value of null removes the "tabIndex" attribute from the widget's bounding box.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterTabIndexChange

attribute.description: The indentation size of tab key.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterTabSizeChange

attribute.description: Determine if the tab key will act as space characters or tab characters.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterUseSoftTabsChange

attribute.description: Determine if the line will break when it reaches the end of the line.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterUseWrapModeChange

attribute.description: Some predefined value on the editor.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterValueChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating whether or not the Widget is visible.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterVisibleChange

attribute.description: The width of ACE Editor.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterWidthChange

attribute.description: The outermost DOM node for the Widget, used for sizing and positioning of a Widget as well as a containing element for any decorator elements used for skinning.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: boundingBox

attribute.description: A DOM node that is a direct descendant of a Widget's bounding box that houses its content.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: contentBox

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the destroy lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: destroyed

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget should be disabled. The disabled implementation is left to the specific classes extending widget.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget, or one of its descendants, has focus.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: focused

attribute.description: The height of ACE Editor.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"400"}-->
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Determine if the active line of code will be highlighted or not.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"true"}-->
attribute.name: highlightActiveLine

attribute.description: <!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the init lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: initialized

attribute.description: The default locale for the widget. NOTE: Using get/set on the "strings" attribute will return/set strings for this locale.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false,"defaultValue":"en"}-->
attribute.name: locale

attribute.description: Correspond to the language being typed.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: mode

attribute.description: The outermost DOM node for the Widget, used for sizing and positioning of a Widget as well as a containing element for any decorator elements used for skinning.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onBoundingBoxChange

attribute.name: onContentBoxChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the destroy lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onDestroyedChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget should be disabled. The disabled implementation is left to the specific classes extending widget.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onDisabledChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget, or one of its descendants, has focus.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onFocusedChange

attribute.description: The height of ACE Editor.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onHeightChange

attribute.description: Determine if the active line of code will be highlighted or not.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onHighlightActiveLineChange

attribute.description: <!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onIdChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the init lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onInitializedChange

attribute.description: The default locale for the widget. NOTE: Using get/set on the "strings" attribute will return/set strings for this locale.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onLocaleChange

attribute.description: Correspond to the language being typed.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onModeChange

attribute.description: Determine if the code will be editable or not.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onReadOnlyChange

attribute.description: Whether or not to render the widget automatically after init, and optionally, to which parent node.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onRenderChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this Widget has been through the render lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onRenderedChange

attribute.description: Determine if print margin will be visible or not.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onShowPrintMarginChange

attribute.description: The DOM node to parse for configuration values, passed to the Widget's HTML_PARSER definition<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onSrcNodeChange

attribute.description: Collection of strings used to label elements of the Widget's UI.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onStringsChange

attribute.description: Number (between -32767 to 32767) indicating the widget's position in the default tab flow. The value is used to set the "tabIndex" attribute on the widget's bounding box. Negative values allow the widget to receive DOM focus programmatically (by calling the focus method), while being removed from the default tab flow. A value of null removes the "tabIndex" attribute from the widget's bounding box.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onTabIndexChange

attribute.description: The indentation size of tab key.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onTabSizeChange

attribute.description: Determine if the tab key will act as space characters or tab characters.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onUseSoftTabsChange

attribute.description: Determine if the line will break when it reaches the end of the line.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onUseWrapModeChange

attribute.description: Some predefined value on the editor.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onValueChange

attribute.name: onVisibleChange

attribute.description: The width of ACE Editor.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onWidthChange

attribute.description: Determine if the code will be editable or not.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: readOnly

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this Widget has been through the render lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Determine if print margin will be visible or not.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"true"}-->
attribute.name: showPrintMargin

attribute.description: The DOM node to parse for configuration values, passed to the Widget's HTML_PARSER definition<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: srcNode

attribute.description: Collection of strings used to label elements of the Widget's UI.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.util.HashMap","required":false,"defaultValue":"{}"}-->
attribute.name: strings

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Number (between -32767 to 32767) indicating the widget's position in the default tab flow. The value is used to set the "tabIndex" attribute on the widget's bounding box. Negative values allow the widget to receive DOM focus programmatically (by calling the focus method), while being removed from the default tab flow. A value of null removes the "tabIndex" attribute from the widget's bounding box.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"null"}-->
attribute.name: tabIndex

attribute.description: The indentation size of tab key.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"4"}-->
attribute.name: tabSize

attribute.description: Determine if the tab key will act as space characters or tab characters.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"true"}-->
attribute.name: useSoftTabs

attribute.description: Determine if the line will break when it reaches the end of the line.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"true"}-->
attribute.name: useWrapMode

attribute.description: Some predefined value on the editor.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Boolean indicating whether or not the Widget is visible.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"true"}-->
attribute.name: visible

attribute.description: Whether or not to render the widget automatically after init, and optionally, to which parent node.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Object","required":false}-->
attribute.name: widgetRender

attribute.description: The name of the widget's javascript variable.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: The width of ACE Editor.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"800"}-->
attribute.name: width

tag.description:
A base class for Rating, providing:
  • A non-obstrusive star rating control
  • Could be based on a set of radio input boxes
Check the [live demo](http://alloyui.com/examples/rating/).

attribute.description: The outermost DOM node for the Widget, used for sizing and positioning of a Widget as well as a containing element for any decorator elements used for skinning.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterBoundingBoxChange

attribute.description: If true could be reseted (i.e., have no values selected).
attribute.name: afterCanResetChange

attribute.description: A DOM node that is a direct descendant of a Widget's bounding box that houses its content.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterContentBoxChange

attribute.description: CSS class to be automatically added to the boundingBox.
attribute.name: afterCssClassChange

attribute.description: CSS classes applied on Rating.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterCssClassesChange

attribute.description: The number of selected starts when the Rating render.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDefaultSelectedChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the destroy lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDestroyedChange

attribute.description: Whether the Rating is disabled or not. Disabled Ratings don't allow hover or click, just display selected stars.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDisabledChange

attribute.description: NodeList of elements used on the Rating. Each element is one Star.
attribute.name: afterElementsChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget, or one of its descendants, has focus.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterFocusedChange

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the height of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterHeightChange

attribute.description: Hidden input to handle the selected value. This hidden input replace the radio elements and keep the same name.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterHiddenInputChange

attribute.description: CSS class added to hide the boundingBox when visible is set to false.
attribute.name: afterHideClassChange

attribute.description: <!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterIdChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the init lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterInitializedChange

attribute.description: Name of the hiddenInput element. If not specified will use the name of the replaced radio.
attribute.name: afterInputNameChange

attribute.description: Label to be displayed with the Rating elements.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterLabelChange

attribute.description: DOM Node to display the text of the StarRating. If not specified try to query using HTML_PARSER an element inside boundingBox which matches aui-rating-label-element.
attribute.name: afterLabelNodeChange

attribute.description: The default locale for the widget. NOTE: Using get/set on the "strings" attribute will return/set strings for this locale.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterLocaleChange

attribute.description: If true the render phase will be autimatically invoked preventing the .render() manual call.
attribute.name: afterRenderChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this Widget has been through the render lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterRenderedChange

attribute.description: Stores the index of the selected element.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterSelectedIndexChange

attribute.description: If true will extract the value of the title attribute on the radio, and use it on the generated Rating elements.
attribute.name: afterShowTitleChange

attribute.description: Number of Rating elements to be displayed.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterSizeChange

attribute.description: The DOM node to parse for configuration values, passed to the Widget's HTML_PARSER definition<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterSrcNodeChange

attribute.description: Collection of strings used to label elements of the Widget's UI.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterStringsChange

attribute.description: Number (between -32767 to 32767) indicating the widget's position in the default tab flow. The value is used to set the "tabIndex" attribute on the widget's bounding box. Negative values allow the widget to receive DOM focus programmatically (by calling the focus method), while being removed from the default tab flow. A value of null removes the "tabIndex" attribute from the widget's bounding box.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterTabIndexChange

attribute.description: If set, will be used when there is no DOM title on the radio elements.
attribute.name: afterTitleChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if use of the WAI-ARIA Roles and States should be enabled for the Widget.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterUseARIAChange

attribute.description: Stores the value of the current selected Rating element.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterValueChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating whether or not the Widget is visible.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterVisibleChange

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the width of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterWidthChange

attribute.description: The outermost DOM node for the Widget, used for sizing and positioning of a Widget as well as a containing element for any decorator elements used for skinning.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: boundingBox

attribute.description: If true could be reseted (i.e., have no values selected).
attribute.name: canReset

attribute.description: A DOM node that is a direct descendant of a Widget's bounding box that houses its content.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: contentBox

attribute.description: CSS class to be automatically added to the boundingBox.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: CSS classes applied on Rating.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.util.HashMap","required":false}-->
attribute.name: cssClasses

attribute.description: The number of selected starts when the Rating render.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"0"}-->
attribute.name: defaultSelected

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the destroy lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: destroyed

attribute.description: NodeList of elements used on the Rating. Each element is one Star.
attribute.name: elements

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget, or one of its descendants, has focus.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: focused

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the height of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Object","required":false}-->
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Hidden input to handle the selected value. This hidden input replace the radio elements and keep the same name.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Object","required":false}-->
attribute.name: hiddenInput

attribute.description: CSS class added to hide the boundingBox when visible is set to false.
attribute.name: hideClass

attribute.description: <!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the init lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: initialized

attribute.description: Name of the hiddenInput element. If not specified will use the name of the replaced radio.
attribute.name: inputName

attribute.description: Label to be displayed with the Rating elements.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: DOM Node to display the text of the StarRating. If not specified try to query using HTML_PARSER an element inside boundingBox which matches aui-rating-label-element.
attribute.name: labelNode

attribute.description: The default locale for the widget. NOTE: Using get/set on the "strings" attribute will return/set strings for this locale.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false,"defaultValue":"en"}-->
attribute.name: locale

attribute.description: NodeList of elements used on the Rating. Each element is one Star.

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget, or one of its descendants, has focus.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->

attribute.name: onHeightChange

attribute.description: <!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onIdChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the init lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onInitializedChange

attribute.description: Name of the hiddenInput element. If not specified will use the name of the replaced radio.
attribute.name: onInputNameChange

attribute.description: Label to be displayed with the Rating elements.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onLabelChange

attribute.description: DOM Node to display the text of the StarRating. If not specified try to query using HTML_PARSER an element inside boundingBox which matches aui-rating-label-element.
attribute.name: onLabelNodeChange

attribute.description: The default locale for the widget. NOTE: Using get/set on the "strings" attribute will return/set strings for this locale.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onLocaleChange

attribute.description: If true the render phase will be autimatically invoked preventing the .render() manual call.
attribute.name: onRenderChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this Widget has been through the render lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onRenderedChange

attribute.description: Stores the index of the selected element.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onSelectedIndexChange

attribute.description: If true will extract the value of the title attribute on the radio, and use it on the generated Rating elements.
attribute.name: onShowTitleChange

attribute.description: Number of Rating elements to be displayed.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onSizeChange

attribute.description: The DOM node to parse for configuration values, passed to the Widget's HTML_PARSER definition<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onSrcNodeChange

attribute.description: Collection of strings used to label elements of the Widget's UI.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onStringsChange

attribute.description: Number (between -32767 to 32767) indicating the widget's position in the default tab flow. The value is used to set the "tabIndex" attribute on the widget's bounding box. Negative values allow the widget to receive DOM focus programmatically (by calling the focus method), while being removed from the default tab flow. A value of null removes the "tabIndex" attribute from the widget's bounding box.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onTabIndexChange

attribute.description: If set, will be used when there is no DOM title on the radio elements.
attribute.name: onTitleChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if use of the WAI-ARIA Roles and States should be enabled for the Widget.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onUseARIAChange

attribute.description: Stores the value of the current selected Rating element.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onValueChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating whether or not the Widget is visible.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onVisibleChange

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the width of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onWidthChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this Widget has been through the render lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Stores the index of the selected element.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"-1"}-->
attribute.name: selectedIndex

attribute.description: If true will extract the value of the title attribute on the radio, and use it on the generated Rating elements.
attribute.name: showTitle

attribute.description: Number of Rating elements to be displayed.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"5"}-->
attribute.name: size

attribute.description: The DOM node to parse for configuration values, passed to the Widget's HTML_PARSER definition<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: srcNode

attribute.description: Collection of strings used to label elements of the Widget's UI.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.util.HashMap","required":false,"defaultValue":"{}"}-->
attribute.name: strings

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Number (between -32767 to 32767) indicating the widget's position in the default tab flow. The value is used to set the "tabIndex" attribute on the widget's bounding box. Negative values allow the widget to receive DOM focus programmatically (by calling the focus method), while being removed from the default tab flow. A value of null removes the "tabIndex" attribute from the widget's bounding box.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"null"}-->
attribute.name: tabIndex

attribute.description: If set, will be used when there is no DOM title on the radio elements.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if use of the WAI-ARIA Roles and States should be enabled for the Widget.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: useARIA

attribute.description: Stores the value of the current selected Rating element.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false,"defaultValue":"null"}-->
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Boolean indicating whether or not the Widget is visible.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"true"}-->
attribute.name: visible

attribute.description: If true the render phase will be autimatically invoked preventing the .render() manual call.
attribute.name: widgetRender

attribute.description: The name of the widget's javascript variable.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the width of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Object","required":false}-->
attribute.name: width

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

tag.description: A base class for TabView. Check the [live demo](http://alloyui.com/examples/tabview/).

attribute.description: Returns the Widget's currently focused descendant Widget.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Object","required":false}-->
attribute.name: activeDescendant

attribute.description: Returns the Widget's currently focused descendant Widget.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterActiveDescendantChange

attribute.description: The outermost DOM node for the Widget, used for sizing and positioning of a Widget as well as a containing element for any decorator elements used for skinning.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterBoundingBoxChange

attribute.description: A DOM node that is a direct descendant of a Widget's bounding box that houses its content.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterContentBoxChange

attribute.description: String representing the default type of the children managed by this Widget. Can also supply default type as a constructor reference.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDefaultChildTypeChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the destroy lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDestroyedChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget should be disabled. The disabled implementation is left to the specific classes extending widget.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDisabledChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget, or one of its descendants, has focus.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterFocusedChange

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the height of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterHeightChange

attribute.description: <!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterIdChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the init lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterInitializedChange

attribute.description: The default locale for the widget. NOTE: Using get/set on the "strings" attribute will return/set strings for this locale.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterLocaleChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if multiple children can be selected at once. Whether or not multiple selection is enabled is always delegated to the value of the multiple attribute of the root widget in the object hierarchy.
attribute.name: afterMultipleChange

attribute.description: Whether or not to render the widget automatically after init, and optionally, to which parent node.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterRenderChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this Widget has been through the render lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterRenderedChange

attribute.description: Returns the currently selected child Widget. If the mulitple attribte is set to true will return an Y.ArrayList instance containing the currently selected children. If no children are selected, will return null.
attribute.name: afterSelectionChange

attribute.description: The DOM node to parse for configuration values, passed to the Widget's HTML_PARSER definition<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterSrcNodeChange

attribute.description: Determine the orientation of tabs. Can be stacked (vertical) or not (horizontal).<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->

A value of null removes the "tabIndex" attribute from the widget's bounding box.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->

tag.description:
A base class for ThumbRating, providing:
  • A non-obstrusive star rating control using Thumb up and Thumb down icons
  • Could be based on a set of radio input boxes
Check the [live demo](http://alloyui.com/examples/rating/).

attribute.description: The outermost DOM node for the Widget, used for sizing and positioning of a Widget as well as a containing element for any decorator elements used for skinning.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterBoundingBoxChange

attribute.description: If true could be reseted (i.e., have no values selected).
attribute.name: afterCanResetChange

attribute.description: A DOM node that is a direct descendant of a Widget's bounding box that houses its content.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterContentBoxChange

attribute.description: CSS class to be automatically added to the boundingBox.
attribute.name: afterCssClassChange

attribute.description: CSS classes applied on ThumbRating.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterCssClassesChange

attribute.description: The number of selected starts when the Rating render.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDefaultSelectedChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the destroy lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDestroyedChange

attribute.description: Whether the Rating is disabled or not. Disabled Ratings don't allow hover or click, just display selected stars.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterDisabledChange

attribute.description: NodeList of elements used on the Rating. Each element is one Star.
attribute.name: afterElementsChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget, or one of its descendants, has focus.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterFocusedChange

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the height of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterHeightChange

attribute.description: Hidden input to handle the selected value. This hidden input replace the radio elements and keep the same name.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterHiddenInputChange

attribute.description: CSS class added to hide the boundingBox when visible is set to false.
attribute.name: afterHideClassChange

attribute.description: <!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterIdChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the init lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterInitializedChange

attribute.description: Name of the hiddenInput element. If not specified will use the name of the replaced radio.
attribute.name: afterInputNameChange

attribute.description: Label to be displayed with the Rating elements.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterLabelChange

attribute.description: DOM Node to display the text of the StarRating. If not specified try to query using HTML_PARSER an element inside boundingBox which matches aui-rating-label-element.
attribute.name: afterLabelNodeChange

attribute.description: The default locale for the widget. NOTE: Using get/set on the "strings" attribute will return/set strings for this locale.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterLocaleChange

attribute.description: If true the render phase will be autimatically invoked preventing the .render() manual call.
attribute.name: afterRenderChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this Widget has been through the render lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterRenderedChange

attribute.description: Stores the index of the selected element.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterSelectedIndexChange

attribute.description: If true will extract the value of the title attribute on the radio, and use it on the generated Rating elements.
attribute.name: afterShowTitleChange

attribute.description: The size on ThumbRating is always 2 (i.e., thumb up and thumb down).<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterSizeChange

attribute.description: The DOM node to parse for configuration values, passed to the Widget's HTML_PARSER definition<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterSrcNodeChange

attribute.description: Collection of strings used to label elements of the Widget's UI.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterStringsChange

attribute.description: Number (between -32767 to 32767) indicating the widget's position in the default tab flow. The value is used to set the "tabIndex" attribute on the widget's bounding box. Negative values allow the widget to receive DOM focus programmatically (by calling the focus method), while being removed from the default tab flow. A value of null removes the "tabIndex" attribute from the widget's bounding box.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterTabIndexChange

attribute.description: If set, will be used when there is no DOM title on the radio elements.
attribute.name: afterTitleChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if use of the WAI-ARIA Roles and States should be enabled for the Widget.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterUseARIAChange

attribute.description: Stores the value of the current selected Rating element.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterValueChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating whether or not the Widget is visible.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterVisibleChange

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the width of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: afterWidthChange

attribute.description: The outermost DOM node for the Widget, used for sizing and positioning of a Widget as well as a containing element for any decorator elements used for skinning.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: boundingBox

attribute.description: If true could be reseted (i.e., have no values selected).
attribute.name: canReset

attribute.description: A DOM node that is a direct descendant of a Widget's bounding box that houses its content.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: contentBox

attribute.description: CSS class to be automatically added to the boundingBox.
attribute.name: cssClass

attribute.description: CSS classes applied on ThumbRating.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.util.HashMap","required":false}-->
attribute.name: cssClasses

attribute.description: The number of selected starts when the Rating render.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"0"}-->
attribute.name: defaultSelected

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the destroy lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: destroyed

attribute.description: NodeList of elements used on the Rating. Each element is one Star.
attribute.name: elements

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget, or one of its descendants, has focus.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: focused

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the height of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Object","required":false}-->
attribute.name: height

attribute.description: Hidden input to handle the selected value. This hidden input replace the radio elements and keep the same name.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Object","required":false}-->
attribute.name: hiddenInput

attribute.description: CSS class added to hide the boundingBox when visible is set to false.
attribute.name: hideClass

attribute.description: <!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the init lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: initialized

attribute.description: Name of the hiddenInput element. If not specified will use the name of the replaced radio.
attribute.name: inputName

attribute.description: Label to be displayed with the Rating elements.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: DOM Node to display the text of the StarRating. If not specified try to query using HTML_PARSER an element inside boundingBox which matches aui-rating-label-element.
attribute.name: labelNode

attribute.description: The default locale for the widget. NOTE: Using get/set on the "strings" attribute will return/set strings for this locale.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false,"defaultValue":"en"}-->
attribute.name: locale

attribute.description: The outermost DOM node for the Widget, used for sizing and positioning of a Widget as well as a containing element for any decorator elements used for skinning.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onBoundingBoxChange

attribute.description: If true could be reseted (i.e., have no values selected).
attribute.name: onCanResetChange

attribute.description: A DOM node that is a direct descendant of a Widget's bounding box that houses its content.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onContentBoxChange

attribute.description: CSS class to be automatically added to the boundingBox.
attribute.name: onCssClassChange

attribute.description: CSS classes applied on ThumbRating.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onCssClassesChange

attribute.description: The number of selected starts when the Rating render.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onDefaultSelectedChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the destroy lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onDestroyedChange

attribute.description: Whether the Rating is disabled or not. Disabled Ratings don't allow hover or click, just display selected stars.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onDisabledChange

attribute.description: NodeList of elements used on the Rating. Each element is one Star.
attribute.name: onElementsChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if the Widget, or one of its descendants, has focus.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onFocusedChange

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the height of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onHeightChange

attribute.description: Hidden input to handle the selected value. This hidden input replace the radio elements and keep the same name.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onHiddenInputChange

attribute.description: CSS class added to hide the boundingBox when visible is set to false.
attribute.name: onHideClassChange

attribute.description: <!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onIdChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this object has been through the init lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onInitializedChange

attribute.description: Name of the hiddenInput element. If not specified will use the name of the replaced radio.
attribute.name: onInputNameChange

attribute.description: Label to be displayed with the Rating elements.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onLabelChange

attribute.description: DOM Node to display the text of the StarRating. If not specified try to query using HTML_PARSER an element inside boundingBox which matches aui-rating-label-element.
attribute.name: onLabelNodeChange

attribute.description: The default locale for the widget. NOTE: Using get/set on the "strings" attribute will return/set strings for this locale.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onLocaleChange

attribute.description: If true the render phase will be autimatically invoked preventing the .render() manual call.
attribute.name: onRenderChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this Widget has been through the render lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onRenderedChange

attribute.description: Stores the index of the selected element.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onSelectedIndexChange

attribute.description: If true will extract the value of the title attribute on the radio, and use it on the generated Rating elements.
attribute.name: onShowTitleChange

attribute.description: The size on ThumbRating is always 2 (i.e., thumb up and thumb down).<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onSizeChange

attribute.description: The DOM node to parse for configuration values, passed to the Widget's HTML_PARSER definition<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onSrcNodeChange

attribute.description: Collection of strings used to label elements of the Widget's UI.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onStringsChange

attribute.description: Number (between -32767 to 32767) indicating the widget's position in the default tab flow. The value is used to set the "tabIndex" attribute on the widget's bounding box. Negative values allow the widget to receive DOM focus programmatically (by calling the focus method), while being removed from the default tab flow. A value of null removes the "tabIndex" attribute from the widget's bounding box.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onTabIndexChange

attribute.description: If set, will be used when there is no DOM title on the radio elements.
attribute.name: onTitleChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if use of the WAI-ARIA Roles and States should be enabled for the Widget.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onUseARIAChange

attribute.description: Stores the value of the current selected Rating element.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onValueChange

attribute.description: Boolean indicating whether or not the Widget is visible.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onVisibleChange

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the width of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":true,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: onWidthChange

attribute.description: Flag indicating whether or not this Widget has been through the render lifecycle phase.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Stores the index of the selected element.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"-1"}-->
attribute.name: selectedIndex

attribute.description: If true will extract the value of the title attribute on the radio, and use it on the generated Rating elements.
attribute.name: showTitle

attribute.description: The size on ThumbRating is always 2 (i.e., thumb up and thumb down).<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"2"}-->
attribute.name: size

attribute.description: The DOM node to parse for configuration values, passed to the Widget's HTML_PARSER definition<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false}-->
attribute.name: srcNode

attribute.description: Collection of strings used to label elements of the Widget's UI.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.util.HashMap","required":false,"defaultValue":"{}"}-->
attribute.name: strings

attribute.description: The name of a CSS class that is to be rendered within the class attribute.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Number (between -32767 to 32767) indicating the widget's position in the default tab flow. The value is used to set the "tabIndex" attribute on the widget's bounding box. Negative values allow the widget to receive DOM focus programmatically (by calling the focus method), while being removed from the default tab flow. A value of null removes the "tabIndex" attribute from the widget's bounding box.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Number","required":false,"defaultValue":"null"}-->
attribute.name: tabIndex

attribute.description: If set, will be used when there is no DOM title on the radio elements.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Boolean indicating if use of the WAI-ARIA Roles and States should be enabled for the Widget.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"false"}-->
attribute.name: useARIA

attribute.description: Stores the value of the current selected Rating element.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.String","outputType":"java.lang.String","required":false,"defaultValue":"null"}-->
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Boolean indicating whether or not the Widget is visible.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"boolean","outputType":"boolean","required":false,"defaultValue":"true"}-->
attribute.name: visible

attribute.description: If true the render phase will be autimatically invoked preventing the .render() manual call.
attribute.name: widgetRender

attribute.description: The name of the widget's javascript variable.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: String with units, or number, representing the width of the Widget. If a number is provided, the default unit, defined by the Widgets DEF_UNIT, property is used.<!--{"event":false,"inputType":"java.lang.Object","outputType":"java.lang.Object","required":false}-->
attribute.name: width
